chat.sforms.description: Extensives Datapack, das alle Monster bei Helligkeit 0 in Schattengestalten verwandelt, sowie einige dazugehörige Features hinzufügt
chat.sforms.incorrect_version_warning: /!\ Scheinbar nutzt Du die falsche Minecraft Version für diese Version von Schattengestalten. Bitte wechsle zur korrekten Version, damit alles einwandfrei funktioniert.

death.attack.sforms.gloombloom: %1$s kassiert ein Ratio + fettes L + cope + Skillproblem + heul leise + werd besser + komm klar + interessiert keinen + hab nicht gefragt.
advancement.sforms.kill_strong_shadow: But their red orbs, without beam
advancement.sforms.kill_strong_shadow.de:
§o§fTo thy weariness shall seem
As a burning and a fever
Which would cling to thee for ever§r

Successfully kill a Strong Shadow
advancement.sforms.get_blackened_heart: Evil things, in robes of sorrow
advancement.sforms.get_blackened_heart.d: Obtain a Blackened Heart by killing a Strong Shadow
advancement.sforms.create_altar: And the fever called "Living" is conquered at last.
advancement.sforms.commence_ritual: From thy spirit shall they pass
advancement.sforms.kill_20_shadowforms: Lions and tigers and bears. Oh my!
advancement.sforms.drank_shadow_brew.des:
§r
 
Drink a bottle of Shadow Brew
advancement.sforms.equip_sacrificial_hea: I smiled — for §owhat§r more had I to fear?
Equip a Sacrificial Heart in your chest slot
advancement.sforms.below_y_zero: From Hell unto a high estate far up within the Heaven —
advancement.sforms.below_y_zero.descript: Venture below the stone layer into the deepslate layer
